hadiths.text: Usama reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:Plague is a calamity which was inflicted on those who were before you, or upon Bani Isra'il. So when it has broken out in a land, don't run out of it, and when it has spread in a land, then don't enter it

chapter.eng-name: The Plague, Ill Omens, Soothsaying And The Like
